changes.title: Fixes and Improvements
changes.text:
[EN-4056] - Particle System performance improvements
[EN-4027] - [WebGL2] Normal maps DXT5nm - remove custom normal map conversion
[EN-4049] - Fix - false collision detection with using pooling objects
[EN-4054] - Fix - The SpriteMaskComponent, when resetting the sprite property from the pool sprites, causes the mask to not render
[EN-4069] - ParticleSystem - fix for no cache for Get/SetParticles
[EN-4071] - [WebGL] Fix WebGL INVALID_ENUM warning
[EN-4072] - Fix - RTS doesn't work on Unity 2022.3
[EN-4073] - Fix incorrect LineRenderer behavior
[EN-4082] - [EasyDoc Converter] fix security warning
[EN-4083] - Fix for Slider.OnValueChange
[EN-4085] - [TextMeshPro] FadeOn/Out fix for two atlases
[EN-4088] - Fix the issue when shaders may break if the SVC is not cleared
[EN-4091] - Fix character animation + inverse kinematics
[EN-4097] - Fix the lighting differences between Unity and Plugin builds
[EN-4102] - CodeCompilerV2: Compilation error fix
